title: XDM Business Person Components
description: This Mixin is used to capture B2B Person specific relationship attributes and other attributes which are required for person segmentation.

xdm:sourceExternalID.title: Source External ID
xdm:sourceExternalID.description: External source unique identifier at the source.

xdm:personSegmentTraits.title: Person Segmentation Attributes
xdm:personSegmentTraits.description: These attributes are required to build predicates for person segmentation.

xdm:personStatus.title: Person Status
xdm:personStatus.description: Field recording the current marketing/sales status of the Person.

xdm:personSource.title: Person Source
xdm:personSource.description: Source from where the information regarding the person was received.

xdm:personScore.title: Person Score
xdm:personScore.description: A Score generated for a person by the CRM system.

xdm:inferredAddress.title: Inferred Address
xdm:inferredAddress.description: Address details inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredCompany.title: Inferred Company
xdm:inferredCompany.description: Company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredCompanyStatus.title: Inferred Company Status
xdm:inferredCompanyStatus.description: Status of the company name inferred by reverse IP lookup of the lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredMetropolitanArea.title: Inferred Metropolitan Area
xdm:inferredMetropolitanArea.description: Metropolitan area inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.

xdm:inferredPhoneAreaCode.title: Inferred Phone Area Code
xdm:inferredPhoneAreaCode.description: Phone area code inferred by reverse IP lookup of lead’s first recorded web visit.
